name: New Mountain Learning
overview:
New Mountain Learning is a newly formed, diversified education company devoted to overseeing the continued development and growth of five prominent and established brands; EMC Publishing, Paradigm Publishing, JIST Publishing, RCL Benziger and Standard Publishing. The brands serve the vertical market needs of public and private educational institutions in K-12 through post secondary levels, as well as the religion education category. Each brand provides traditional print and technology products and services for a wide range of learning needs including world language, religion education, secondary and post secondary technical/computer applications training, career counseling, life skills and job search guidance.

New Mountain Learning’s focus is to build an advanced platform for growth that leverages each brand’s considerable strengths, delivering the right balance of traditional publishing products with the technology driven support tools that the marketplace demands. We leverage our collective knowledge and technology assets across the all brands, delivering a consistent experience for educators, administrators and students.

Over many years, each brand has amassed an exemplary track record for quality, integrity and professionalism. As part of the larger unified education company, the brands now share best practices and resources, placing New Mountain Learning in an advantageous position to deliver rigorous and innovative learning solutions that educators need today, more than ever.

The New Mountain “formula” for effective learning is simple – create learning solutions that allow for productive management of the classroom and improved student preparedness…fostering individual success in careers and life. Our over-arching goal is to assist in our clients’ professional success, providing uncompromising value to educators, students, schools and shareholders in the process.
